heading: The <br class="hidden xs:block"/>Advantages
description: In addition to saving on electricity bills, photovoltaic systems reduce environmental impact and make us less dependent on large power companies. The main advantages of having your own photovoltaic system are:

ventajas.title: ECONOMIC
content: Reduction in energy costs: sharing generated energy reduces the electricity bill.
Energy independence: from large power companies and fluctuations in market prices.
Tax incentives and subsidies: deductions in IBI and IRPF largely compensate for the investment that panel installation entails.
Increase in property value: better energy classification increases property value by 10% to 20%.
Surplus compensation: excess energy is not lost or sold.

ventajas.title: ENVIRONMENTAL
content: Reduction of carbon footprint: decreases greenhouse gas emissions.
Promotion of renewable energies: promotes the use of sustainable technologies and contributes to the energy transition.
Lower environmental impact: reduces the need for large-scale electricity generation.
Better environmental awareness: fosters responsible energy consumption and care for the planet.

ventajas.title: SOCIAL
content: Strengthening communities: promotes cooperation and a sense of belonging among neighbors by sharing a common resource.
Inclusive access to renewable energy: people without the possibility of installing individual systems access clean energy thanks to collective self-consumption.

ventajas.title: TECHNOLOGICAL
content: Innovation and efficiency: favors the use of advanced technologies such as storage systems, smart grids, and energy management platforms.
Energy autonomy: local systems distributed throughout the community that can function even during general power grid failures.

ventajas.title: LEGAL
content: Compliance with climate regulations: contributes to sustainability objectives established by governments and international organizations.
